original_text: While the disciples were picking the grains, some Pharisees saw them. They said to Jesus, ‘Look at what your disciples are doing! It is against God's Law to do that on our day of rest.’
korean_text: 바리새인들이 보고 예수께 말하되 보시오 당신의 제자들이 안식일에 하지 못할 일을 하나이다

sentences.original_text: While the disciples were picking the grains
'Look at what your disciples are doing!
to do that on our day of rest.'
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 안식일에 그런 일을 하는 것은'
